subject: Sleep
title: Do Blind People Dream Visually
description: A fast breakdown of Do Blind People Dream Visually for builders.

hook.text: If you've never seen anything, what do your dreams look like? Do they even look like anything at all?

buildup.text: People blind from birth report dreams rich in sound, touch, smell, and taste, but with no visual imagery.

discovery.text: People who lost sight after age five still dream visually, using stored visual memories.

twist.text: The brain dreams in whatever senses it has experienced. Congenitally deaf people dream without sound.

climax.text: Dreams are built from the raw material of your waking experience. No input, no output in that modality.

punchline.text: Your dreams are limited to what your senses have known.

quiz.question: How do people blind from birth experience dreams?
options: Through sound, touch, smell, and taste without vision
They see colors but not shapes
